p: Urogenital pathogens were isolated from women as either single infection or coinfections. The presence of a single pathogen was recovered from 140 women (28%) . The remaining urogenital pathogens were diversely recovered from women as two (34%, N = 129), three (6.5%, N = 33), four (1.8%, N = 9) or six coinfections (0.2%, N = 1) (Table 1).
